nodes.title: Announcing a new open source project, Denoflow https://t.co/eWzboc43e0 , an upgraded version of Actionsflow, more lightweight, easy to use, powerful. Also based on yaml configuration , but using Deno as the runtime , you can use any deno module in the workflow , or ts/js code.

nodes.title:
I created this site for my own needs:
1. Get updates of my favorite awesome list in a timely manner. 
2. See the star count while I was browsing the awesome repo.

I'm glad if this also happens to meet your needs. https://t.co/KiHAFK29eE
